post.body: - When is EDITING SUITE DAY?
- Great! Are you learning to play electric or acoustic? (There is no RIGHT answer, I'm just interested!)
Vivid Soda | Burlesque Revue 3 went just swell honey! What's all this about Christmas dinner???
- Sat here at 02:49 HRS in the UK - This is great! Go Perry & Ryan - And get the horse crap line in again!
- Give me some of that ActionScript VooDoo baaaaaaaby
You in today old boy - I fancy lunch in Henley-on-Thames @ and espresso al la L'Hotel Du Vin!
Cheers - thats great!
Oooh - You did THAT! Brave Man! I just find it funny - Maybe there's a new power psychosis going on!
We're mad scientists with F1 cars and we're trying to figure something out...How to make them go faster...by THINKING
I added Chaz on Fb - Will get in touch asap - Thanks for your introduction!
- and there's this stuff: http://twitpic.com/vh32
- welcome back to twitter old boy
- Don't think I'd make it in the USA - I still think Starbucks is something to do with Battlestar Gallactica and CA is a chem sym!
http://twitpic.com/uj8f - Project Silentwater #1
Looking for (licensed) racing drivers, Psych research project, No payment, F1 cars, Scary people, Dangerous stuff, We're going to THE EDGE
I am having one of THOSE days - You know, where you get the opportunity to REALLY BLOW MINDS!
Any guitarists out there? I'm looking for some people to survey about learning to play the guitar and stuff - DO LET ME KNOW!
Contemplating a Pizza Hut dinner and some serious altered dominant scales practice....ooh I like the sound of THAT!
Im doing this --> http://tinyurl.com/4xau2h
Trying to embed code in swf files - and messing it all up quite intollerably!
Looking for a Charter Marque and a girl with orange hair in deepest darkest F1 City
Well I guess I'm going to be reading The Four Hour Work Week - Cheers Perry!
Yes that's you Pritchard you intollerable wretch - SMILE FFS - Your going to be in the morning papers!
Looking for a grumpy tog and a follow spot!
Just about recovered from Vivid Soda | Burlesque Revue 3 on Sunday.
Vivid Soda | Burlesque Revue 3 - Tonight @ The Picturedrome - F1 City - Northampton - "Pick Your Poison"!
If you're really really good at video games and cannot live without MSM your musical career path is ROADIE...deal with it
Matt King has been located and hired for Vivid Soda | Burlesque Revue 3 - Thank you for the responses!
Looking forward to a FULL ON family day with Mrs Law & The Girls - It's DADDY TIME!
Does anyone know how to use a Sony Alpha 350 - I figured out taking the lens cap off, now where's the TALENT SWITCH ?
22:16 Hrs UK - Time to party - See you on The Other Side
Thinking its hilarious how all the wannabe marketing gurus UNFOLLOW people who DARE to talk about something other than internet marketing!
building databases - oh the joys of internet marketing!
Racing drivers wanted - Driver performance research - Global - http://tinyurl.com/97aqln
Twitteredom - Are there any guitarists out there? I have some cool (FREE) learning stuff if anyone's interested...DM me - D
Singapore, Sydney & Phuket - Diary is looking good for 2009 so far!
Scofield - Rule of Thumb...A bit of JAZZ
looking for a belt - it's not the Bat Belt, so how come The World Stops until I find it...damn this wardrobe tidy system...
Looking for a NEW GAME to play
Happy Christmas from Northampton Cathedral - God (at F1) Speed!
